Title: Creation and Testing of Downlink Communications System
Description: Evaluation of requirements, implementation on engineering model, integration with PPL system and performance testing
Required Resources/Facilities: Mission documentation, Target SDR documentation, MATLAB, Simulink, Vivado, Python, C++, Static analysis tools, FPGA Development board, transceiver development board

Title: Assess STRATHcube Communication System Work to Date
Deliverables: Literature review of STRATHcube communication system
Description: Evaluate current state of communication system to identify progress, gaps and requirements

Title: Review DVB-S2 Standard and Relevant Communication Standards
Description: Analyse DVB-S2 system, determine suitability to mission, identify suitable architecture

Title: Research DVB-S2 SDR Implementations
Description: Research previous implementations of DVB-S2 transmitters on SDR

Title: Functional Requirement Generation for Downlink Communication System
Description: Collaborate with Systems Engineers to develop functional requirements for system development.

Title: Review of Target SDR Hardware
Deliverables: FPGA resource requirements, identification of suitable development boards for engineering model
Description: Investigate available documentation regarding the target SDR platform to evaluate FPGA resources and design requirements.

Title: Downlink Communications Architecture Development
Deliverables: High level end to end system design document for downlink transmitter
Description: Identification of all blocks required to implement downlink communication system. Identification of suitable resources to aid implementation.

Title: Implement DVB-S2 Transmitter on Engineering Model (Programmable Logic)
Description: Creation of FPGA design to implement DVB-S2 Transmission System

Title: Validation of DVB-S2 Transmitter on Engineering Model (Programmable Logic)
Description: Validation of implemented DVB-S2 transmitter to ensure adherence to standard and suitability.

Title: Implementation of Packet Handling on Engineering Model (Processing System)
Description: Implementation of the packet handling system in software

Title: Validation of Packet Handling on Engineering Model (Processing System)
Description: Validation of packet handling system in software.

Title: Downlink Engineering Model End to End Testing
Description: Validation of entire system in hardware.
Required Resources/Facilities: Appropriate FPGA development board, Appropriate transceiver development board

Title: Combination of PPL and Primary Downlink on Engineering Model
Deliverables: Engineering model of combined PPL and downlink communications system
Description: Combine PPL and Downlink FPGA design
Required Resources/Facilities: Appropriate FPGA development board, Appropriate transceiver development board

Title: Analyse FPGA Resource Usage of PPL System and Downlink System on Engineering Model
Deliverables: Resource Usage Report of combined design
Description: Ensure that both designs can fit on target FPGA. Optimising as necessary.
Required Resources/Facilities: Appropriate FPGA development board, Appropriate transceiver development board

Title: End to End Testing of Combined PPL and Downlink System on Engineering Model
Description: Ensure both systems work as expected when combined
Required Resources/Facilities: Appropriate FPGA development board, Appropriate transceiver development board

Title: End to End Testing of Combined PPL and Downlink System on Target SDR
Description: Ensure design works as expected on target SDR.

Title: Receiver Analysis and Modelling
Description: Modelling of receive channel for satellite and subsequent receiver requirement

Title: Channel Research
Description: Identification of relevant literature and model parameters including interference

Title: Channel Model Creation
Description: Modelling expected channel with interference for satellite receiver over course of mission. Creation of link budget

Title: Primary Uplink Receiver Design & Implementation
Prerequisites: Ground station site interference analysis, ground station hardware selection
Description: Design and implement receiver system for primary uplink communications with appropriate filtering to improve SINR.

Title: Receiver Implementation Research
Deliverables: Primary uplimk receiver system architecture, identification of open source resources for development
Description: Research into requirements for receiver, previous implementations

Title: Receiver Interference Filter Design
Description: Design of anti interference filter based on literature and previous analysis

Title: Receiver Implementation
Description: Implementation of primary uplink receiver

Title: Receiver Testing on Engineering Model
Description: Testing of design with synthesised data

Title: Receiver Testing on Target SDR
Description: Testing of design with synthesised data

Title: Uplink System Configuration
Description: Perform tradeoff of options for uplink system

Title: Tradeoff of Modulation, Coding Methods and Rates
Deliverables: Tradeoff Analysis of uplink modulation, coding method and rates.
Description: Identification of suitable methods, tradeoff report outlining expected performance of each

Title: Recommendation of Uplink System Configuration
Deliverables: Final report including methodology, results, and recommendations
Description: Compile all findings and select suitable option.
